ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Re: Chants vs. Melee (was Bards forgotten again.... )
ygData.msgSnippet: According to Rokenn s site Chains will now stack with Enchanter/Shaman Slow debuffs. Tomerrilin PS.  Sylly, does Chains still break the darkness line of
ygData.messageBody:
According to Rokenn's site Chains will now stack with Enchanter/Shaman Slow
debuffs.

Tomerrilin

PS. Sylly, does Chains still break the darkness line of spells?

-----Original Message-----
From: Bill Costlow [mailto:atlatyl@...]
Sent: Thursday, July 13, 2000 6:14 AM
To: eqbards@egroups.com
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Re: Chants vs. Melee (was Bards forgotten
again.... )


Grouping with a good enchanter can be frustrating.
You can't sing damage songs because they break Mezz.
You can't sing Anthem because it overwrites alacraty
(spelling). You can't use Largo's or chain because
that interferes with their Slow spell.

I usually sing COB, Psalm or warmth and Hymm. Not
much else you can do at that point...
